snippet: Real Madrid suffered an almighty fright before a Cristiano Ronaldo hat-trick hauled them back from 2-1 down and gave them a 4-2 win over rank outsiders Kashima Antlers in the Club World Cup final on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Real Madrid suffered an almighty fright before a Cristiano Ronaldo hat-trick hauled them back from 2-1 down and gave them a 4-2 win over rank outsiders Kashima Antlers in the Club World Cup final on Sunday.

headline.main: Real Madrid Survive Scare to Win Club Cup With Ronaldo Hat-Trick
headline.print_headline: Real Madrid Survive Scare to Win Club Cup With Ronaldo Hat-Trick
